SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.description, a.content, a.post_time, a.view_count, a.comment_count, a.like_count, a.tag, u.nickname AS "user.nickname", u.user_id AS "user.user_id", u.photo_src AS "user.photo_src", u.url AS "user.url", u.motto AS "user.motto", u.reg_time AS "user.regTime", u.fans_count AS "user.fansCount", u.attention_count AS "user.attentionCount", c.title AS "category.title", c.cate_id AS "category.cate_id" FROM t_article a, t_user u, t_category c WHERE a.user_id = u.user_id AND a.cate_id = c.cate_id AND a.article_id = #{id}

(SELECT article_id AS "pre.articleId", title AS "pre.title" FROM t_article WHERE article_id < #{id} ORDER BY article_id LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT article_id AS "next.articleId", title AS "next.title" FROM t_article WHERE article_id > #{id} ORDER BY article_id LIMIT 1)
